TITLE: Importing Standalone Components in Radix UI Themes
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to import individual components from Radix UI Themes using standalone entrypoints. This approach allows for more granular imports and potentially better tree-shaking.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/changelog.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: tsx
CODE:
```
import { AlertDialog } from '@radix-ui/themes/components/alert-dialog';
import { Box } from '@radix-ui/themes/components/box';
// We recommend using namespaced imports for compound components
import * as CheckboxGroup from '@radix-ui/themes/components/checkbox-group';
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Radix Themes via npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Radix Themes package using npm, which is required before using any of the theme components in a project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/apps/playground/app/demo/radix-themes-video-script.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install @radix-ui/themes
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating CSS Variables for Transparent Black and White Scales in Radix UI Themes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the changes required for transparent black and white color scales in custom styles. It provides a mapping of old variable names to new ones, adjusting opacity values for better design consistency.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/changelog.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: CSS
CODE:
```
/* Black scale updates */
--black-a1: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.01);
--black-a2: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.024);
--black-a3: var(--black-a1);
--black-a4: var(--black-a2);
--black-a5: var(--black-a2);
--black-a6: var(--black-a3);
--black-a7: var(--black-a3); /* or var(--black-a4) */
--black-a8: var(--black-a5);
--black-a9: var(--black-a6); /* or var(--black-a7) */
--black-a10: var(--black-a7);
--black-a11: var(--black-a8);
--black-a12: var(--black-a11);

/* White scale updates */
--white-a1: transparent;
--white-a2: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.01);
--white-a3: var(--white-a1); /* or var(--white-a2) */
--white-a4: var(--white-a2);
--white-a5: var(--white-a3);
--white-a6: var(--white-a3); /* or var(--white-a4) */
--white-a7: var(--white-a4);
--white-a8: var(--white-a5);
--white-a9: var(--white-a6);
--white-a10: var(--white-a7);
--white-a11: var(--white-a9);
--white-a12: var(--white-a11); /* or var(--white-a12) */
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Tabs CSS Variables in Radix UI Themes
DESCRIPTION: CSS variables for customizing letter spacing and word spacing of active and inactive tabs in the Tabs component to minimize the apparent shift in weight when using custom fonts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/changelog.md#2025-04-17_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
--tabs-trigger-active-letter-spacing
--tabs-trigger-active-word-spacing
--tabs-trigger-inactive-letter-spacing
--tabs-trigger-inactive-word-spacing
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: New ScrollArea Margin Variables in Radix UI Themes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet introduces renamed and expanded CSS variables for controlling scrollbar margins in the ScrollArea component. The new variables provide more granular control over horizontal and vertical scrollbar positioning.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/changelog.md#2025-04-17_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: CSS
CODE:
```
--scrollarea-scrollbar-horizontal-margin-top: /* value */;
--scrollarea-scrollbar-horizontal-margin-bottom: /* value */;
--scrollarea-scrollbar-horizontal-margin-left: /* value */;
--scrollarea-scrollbar-horizontal-margin-right: /* value */;
--scrollarea-scrollbar-vertical-margin-top: /* value */;
--scrollarea-scrollbar-vertical-margin-bottom: /* value */;
--scrollarea-scrollbar-vertical-margin-left: /* value */;
--scrollarea-scrollbar-vertical-margin-right: /* value */;
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: New CSS Variables for Cursor Styles in Radix UI Themes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet introduces new CSS variables to control cursor styles on various interactive elements. These variables allow for easy customization of cursor appearances across different components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/changelog.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: CSS
CODE:
```
--cursor-button: default;
--cursor-checkbox: default;
--cursor-disabled: not-allowed;
--cursor-link: pointer;
--cursor-menu-item: default;
--cursor-radio: default;
--cursor-slider-thumb: default;
--cursor-slider-thumb-active: default;
--cursor-switch: default;
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updated CSS Reset Class in Radix UI Themes
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the new unified reset class for various HTML elements. It replaces the previous separate reset classes for buttons and anchor tags with a single class that can be used across multiple element types.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/changelog.md#2025-04-17_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: CSS
CODE:
```
.rt-reset {
  /* Reset styles for a, button, h1-h6, ol, ul, p, and pre tags */
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: CSS Token Renaming
DESCRIPTION: Breaking changes in CSS custom property naming, affecting surface and contrast color tokens.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/changelog.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
--color-surface-accent -> --accent-surface
--accent-9-contrast -> --accent-contrast
--red-9-contrast -> --red-contrast
--pink-9-contrast -> --pink-contrast
--blue-9-contrast -> --blue-contrast
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: CSS Focus Color Scale
DESCRIPTION: New focus color scale replacing root-level focus, selection, and autofill colors.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/packages/radix-ui-themes/changelog.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
--color-autofill-root -> --focus-a3
--color-focus-root -> --focus-8
--color-selection-root -> --focus-a5
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Publishing Stable Release Command for Radix UI Themes
DESCRIPTION: This command is used to publish a new stable release of Radix UI Themes. It cleans the project, installs dependencies, builds the package, and publishes it.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/release-process.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm clean && pnpm i && pnpm build:pkg
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Publishing Command for Radix UI Themes
DESCRIPTION: This command publishes the new version of Radix UI Themes to the package registry.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/release-process.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm publish -r
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Publishing Pre-release Version Command for Radix UI Themes
DESCRIPTION: This command is used to publish a pre-release version of Radix UI Themes with a specific tag such as alpha, beta, or rc.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/release-process.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm publish -r --tag <tag>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Linting Command for Radix UI Themes
DESCRIPTION: This command runs the linter to check for any errors in the Radix UI Themes project before publishing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/themes/blob/main/release-process.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm lint
```
